sentences.en: As he tried to crawl away, he was hit in the shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他试图爬走时肩膀中枪了。

sentences.en: He caught her by the shoulder and turned her around.
sentences.cn: 他抓住她的肩膀把她的身子转了过来。

sentences.en: He complained a little of a nagging pain between his shoulder blades.
sentences.cn: 他有几句提到说肩胛骨之间一直在疼。

sentences.en: He gave her an encouraging pat on the shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地拍了一下她的肩膀表示鼓励。

sentences.en: He glanced over his shoulder and saw me watching him.
sentences.cn: 他扭头瞥了一眼，看见我正看他。

sentences.en: He put his arm around her shoulders.
sentences.cn: 他用手臂搂住她的肩。

sentences.en: He was wounded in the shoulder by a ricochet.
sentences.cn: 他被一颗跳弹打伤了肩膀。

sentences.en: Her ear, shoulder and hip are in a straight line.
sentences.cn: 她的耳朵、肩膀和髋部呈一条直线。

sentences.en: His shoulders were broad and powerful.
sentences.cn: 他的肩膀宽阔强壮。

sentences.en: His writing benefits from the shade of Lincoln hovering over his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他的写作得益于他感到已故的林肯一直在他身后激励着他。

sentences.en: I braised some beans to accompany a shoulder of lamb.
sentences.cn: 我炖了些豆子，和羊肘子一块吃。

sentences.en: I felt her dark brown hair brushing the back of my shoulder.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到她深褐色的头发拂过我的肩。

sentences.en: I went and stood beside him, looking over his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 我走过去站在他身边，从他的肩头望过去。

sentences.en: Luke answered by tightening his grip on her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 卢克的回应就是把她的肩头抓得更紧了。

sentences.en: She pulled the strap of her nightgown onto her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她将自己睡袍的吊带拉到肩膀上。

sentences.en: She tapped the driver on the shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她拍拍司机的肩。

sentences.en: takeovers are the thing that keeps suppliers looking over their shoulders.
sentences.cn: 接管是让供应商小心谨慎的事情。

sentences.en: The corridors there were painted chocolate-brown to shoulder height.
sentences.cn: 那里的走廊从地面到齐肩高的部分都漆成棕褐色。

sentences.en: The residents are being asked to shoulder the costs of the repairs.
sentences.cn: 居民们被要求承担这笔修理费用。

sentences.en: They shouldered the boat and took it down to the river.
sentences.cn: 他们把船扛在肩上抬到河里。

sentences.en: Turkin tapped him on the shoulder. "Sorry to interrupt, Colonel."
sentences.cn: 图尔金拍拍他的肩膀。“不好意思打断您一下，上校。”

words.tran_cn: 一起,共同,合作,携手,融洽
努力,奋斗,认真,专心一意
坦白的,直率的,清楚的,冒失的
承受,支持,维持,增强,增援

phrases.tran_cn: 靠着我的肩膀哭泣（歌词）
精力充沛地致力于…；倾尽全力

phrases.phrase: put one's shoulder to the wheel

phrases.tran_cn: n. 有肩带的女用手提包
肩带；从肩上斜过胸部的肩带或饰带
肩高；台阶高度；高与肩平

trans.tran_en: one of the two parts of the body at each side of the neck where the arm is connected
to accept a difficult or unpleasant responsibility, duty etc
